widget.name: DropdownDivConverter
widget.description: The DropdownDivConverter converts a Mendix (div-)container into a dropdown menu with a button. Simply create a container in Mendix with the DropdownDivConverter widget in it as it's first child. Everything you will then add as content will be the content of the dropdown menu.

property.caption: dropdown button title
property.description: the title on the dropdown button

property.caption: start open
property.description: will the menu be open on load?
